com.percussion.pso.validation
Class PSOItemXMLSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.pso.validation.PSOItemXMLSupport
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSOAbstractItemValidationExit
public class PSOItemXMLSupport
extends java.lang.Object

Support routines for processing Content Item XML documents. These documents are generated by the server in response to an OpenItem or ViewItem. These routines are likely to be useful in validation and post-exits.

Author:
DavidBenua

getFieldElement

public org.w3c.dom.Element getFieldElement(org.w3c.dom.Document inputDoc,
                                           java.lang.String fieldName)
Finds the field element for a given field

Parameters:
inputDoc - the XML document from the content editor
fieldName - the field name
Returns:
the XML element that represents the field. Will be null if the field does not exist.

getFieldValue

public java.lang.String getFieldValue(org.w3c.dom.Element field)
Finds the String value for a field element.

Parameters:
field - the field element
Returns:
the value. Will be null if there is no <Value> node in the field element.
See Also:
getFieldElement(Document, String)

getFieldLabel

public java.lang.String getFieldLabel(org.w3c.dom.Element field)
Finds the label for a field element. This can be used for error reporting.

Parameters:
field - the field element
Returns:
the label. Will be null if there is no label or the field is null.

isMultiValue

public boolean isMultiValue(org.w3c.dom.Element field)
Determines if a field is multi-value or not.

Parameters:
field - the field element
Returns:
true if this is a multi-value field.
